meanings.definition: The act of giving birth to twins.
meanings.sent1: She experienced the joy of twinning when she had twin babies.
meanings.sent2: The hospital was well-prepared for twinning mothers.
meanings.sent3: The town joked that there must be something in the water causing all the twinning.
meanings.sent4: The twinning of the two babies was like seeing double happiness.
meanings.sent5: The twinning event was a double celebration for the family.

meanings.sent1: The twinning of the eggs resulted in identical twins.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the twinning process in various animal species.
meanings.sent3: The twinning of the seeds in the garden led to a bumper crop.
meanings.sent4: The twinning of the cells was a fascinating biological phenomenon.
meanings.sent5: The twinning procedure was successful, and the couple welcomed twins.

meanings.definition: The state of being a twin.
meanings.sent1: Growing up, she loved the special bond of twinning with her sister.
meanings.sent2: The twinning siblings shared a unique connection.
meanings.sent3: Their twinning often led to mix-ups and mistaken identities.
meanings.sent4: The twinning relationship between the brothers was unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The twinning duo always dressed alike and confused everyone around them.

meanings.definition: The occurrence of two similar or identical things happening at the same time.
meanings.sent1: The twinning of events made it a memorable day.
meanings.sent2: The twinning of ideas between the two friends was uncanny.
meanings.sent3: The twinning of mistakes in their reports caused confusion.
meanings.sent4: The twinning of colors in the painting created a harmonious effect.
meanings.sent5: The twinning of interests brought them closer together.
